segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes by the sink, completely unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and water is spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children behind her, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's so cute how he's trying to get a cookie for himself and his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, looking so expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of warmth, seeing the children working together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees how adorable the children are being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene really makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR
